Dispute_Type: Appeal for extension of time and leave to appeal under pension legislation
Legal_Issue: Whether the designated member erred in granting an extension of time without applying correct legal criteria
Evidence_Assessment: Mr. Roy provided insufficient evidence of continuing intention, no new facts or medical information, no explanation for delay
Decision_Outcome: Extension of time and leave to appeal granted by Board
Burden_of_Proof: Applicant (Mr. Roy) had burden to justify extension based on established criteria
Credibility_Factor: Lack of credible explanation for 18-month delay
Legal_Rule: Discretion under s. 83(1) must consider: continuing intention, arguable case, reasonable explanation for delay, and absence of prejudice
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness, with potential for correctness on questions of law
Procedural_Issue: Improper exercise of discretion in granting time extension
Grounds_for_Claim: Error in law, failure to apply correct legal test, disregard of material facts
Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached; matter remitted for redetermination
Decision_Maker: Designated member of the Pension Appeals Board
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Failure to apply required legal criteria undermines procedural fairness
Key_Evidence_Considered: Timing of application, lack of explanation for delay, absence of new evidence, potential prejudice to Minister
Legal_Framework: Administrative law principles applied to pension appeals
Applicant_Challenge: Minister challenged the Board’s decision to grant late appeal
Court_Result: Judicial review allowed, decision set aside, matter remitted
Standard_of_Proof: Balance of probabilities for discretionary relief
Defendant_Response: Not explicitly stated, but Minister argued improper extension was granted
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence, procedural history, statutory interpretation
Outcome: Board’s decision set aside, matter remitted for reconsideration
Claimant_Status: Mr. Roy as appellant seeking leave to appeal
Applicable_Process: Statutory appeal process under CPP, judicial review under Federal Courts Act
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Application for leave to appeal pending before Board
Governing_Rule: Principles governing discretion under s. 83(1): continuing intention, arguable case, explanation for delay, no prejudice
